mutants.code:
def calculate_adjusted_average(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, K, measurements) = case
        measurements.sort()
        adjusted_measurements = measurements[K:N - K]
        adjusted_average = sum(adjusted_measurements) * (N - 2 * K)
        results.append(adjusted_average)
    return results

    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, K, measurements) = case
        measurements.sort()
        adjusted_measurements = measurements[K:N - K]
        adjusted_average = sum(adjusted_measurements) // (N - 2 * K)
        results.append(adjusted_average)
    return results
